config.installCommand: curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php && mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader

buildCommand: mkdir -p /tmp/laravel_cache /tmp/laravel_views && chmod -R 777 /tmp/laravel_cache /tmp/laravel_views && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && echo 'Production build completed successfully'
